channel.title: sillygwailo tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from sillygwailo.

item.description: Just when I leave town does Toronto‚Äôs Department of Sunsets come out with some of its best work. https://t.co/g4FddjgzzC
@johnnypolitic @Wilnerness It is now.
@jeffjedras Thanks! This one‚Äôs a short one, for a joyous occasion. I‚Äôve been looking forward to this for some time.

YYZ ‚úàÔ∏è YVR ‚úàÔ∏è YQQ
Security at D gates was a breeze. I‚Äôm still good with arriving 3 hours early (and not the recommended 2). I‚Äôm glad I held myself back from arriving 4 hours early.
An hour delay,with the plane stuck at the gate. It‚Äôs hard to get mad when there‚Äôs so much to do (read a book, watch a movie, try to catch the eye of the ground crew and wave at them).
I‚Äôm in the air now. Long flights are where I try to make a decision or two, deciding being the thing I hate doing the most.
I decided a bunch of small things on the flight, mostly consisting of changing ‚Äúwrite/think about‚Äù to ‚Äúdo one thing towards‚Äù in my repeating reminders. Something something cabin pressure makes you think if not better, then at least differently something something.
I usually regret telling European people, well, anything.
@toddsieling I mean, well. https://t.co/83eUEJMEkU

Tonight. https://t.co/Qt5tiAREUz
I‚Äôm a longtime admire of Edward Burtynksy‚Äôs work, and seeing it on Yonge-Dundas Square‚Äôs giant screens with an immersive sound experience was pretty incredible. https://t.co/lCCsyVp4qF
If you missed it tonight, you can see it again tomorrow night. Plan on finding something else to do downtown as well, since it‚Äôs a short show.

Tonight. https://t.co/jrtgu2GrYQ
Of course, I‚Äôm not the only member of @ICCTtweets attending the concert. I ran into 4 of them, almost all at once.
Everybody remembers the first time they saw a guitarist sing into their guitar‚Äôs pickups, I assume. ü§Ø
It could be that J√≥nsi did it when I saw Sigur R√≥s at Echo Beach in 2017, but I might not have noticed until tonight‚Äôs performance.
Same, except Toronto. https://t.co/LW9dVu9tqj
The music of Sigur R√≥s reminds me that I, too, must die.
This afternoon. https://t.co/2dZbWNFyLX
This afternoon. üíê https://t.co/jvSCNWs6rx
It‚Äôs a little concerning to me that procrastination and laziness has paid off, and quite handsomely, 3 times in the past month.

Since I can‚Äôt figure out how to load a TTC day pass on to my Presto card online, I‚Äôm going to bike everywhere today.
Mission accomplished, by the way.
‚ÄúBy then it was too late.‚Äù That‚Äôs what I‚Äôd like to have on my epitaph.
Tonight. https://t.co/bWNFkxtWer
I‚Äôm still thinking of going to Gda≈Ñsk in October.
@TimesTheyAre @mikeinboston @GraphicMatt https://t.co/nhlVPd1J47

@Sean_YYZ ‚ÄúOn the days when ActiveTO has been in effect on Lake Shore, our local fans have experienced significant transit delays because traffic is grinded to a halt on all downtown routes.‚Äù They weren‚Äôt going to games those days. https://t.co/yz9VzEzRzh
@GraphicMatt ‚ÄúWork harder‚Äù is the Homer Simpson approach to management. https://t.co/XdWHz6QlJ7

@GraphicMatt The last two days the Lakeshore Boulevard Activeway was open to cyclists and other active users were on *checks notes* May 23rd and 29th, and the Blue Jays were *checks their schedule* in St. Louis and Los Angeles. #ActiveTO
This makes planning my trip to Kansas City, Las Vegas, Portland, OR and Vancouver, B.C. easier to think about. https://t.co/uqx2ibzGb0

Impossible to see, the future is. Will I be in Toronto when this happens? If so, I‚Äôll stick around, if only to bask in the glow of the happy crowds. It‚Äôs still hard to imagine this happening in a city on the decline, though. https://t.co/9gQmJPoOJQ

Posit: People think the economy might be shaky, leading to a recession. Consequence: People start to reduce their spending. Result: Pretty soon the economy *is* shaky, leading to a recession. Conclusion: You can cause an economy to be shaky, leading to a recession.
@dailysimpsons Was there a phenomenon of any kind localized entirely within their kitchen?
@syncros I know someone who streams that game on Twitch, and at first I was like ‚ÄúWhy would anybody want to play such a game?‚Äù and the next time I looked at the clock, an hour had passed.
An iconic scene from an iconic movie. https://t.co/tOxt1ChIKW
